General.Name: Monarch Mining Corporation
General.Description: Monarch Mining Corporation, a gold mining company, engages in the exploration and development of mining properties in Canada. It owns 295 square kilometers of mining assets, including the Beaufor mine, Croinor property, McKenzie property, Swanson property, and Beacon Mill. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Saint-Sauveur, Canada.
General.Address: 68 Avenue de la Gare, Saint-Sauveur, QC, Canada, J0R 1R0
